author: bridge-bot
content:
<unnawut> re: **@gr3999**
> just want to add a clarification for devnet-0: 

there WILL be validator voting but without signatures, I will also add some more changes to @unnawut 's PR to add few more things in state for this
I think only 3 comments left in my PR that I'd love your inputs before I finish it off, so we can start new PRs for specific changes/additions. Can you help check? @gr3999

1. gossip/reqresp protocol ID structure

2. ENR for ed25519. Kolby mentioned it should be supported but I just want to confirm with you also

3. naming block vs lean_block

author: bridge-bot
content:
<unnawut> Btw, I got asked whether we're going for md or python specs, so just for clarity, to avoid specs delay I think we should stick to the markdown specs as source of truth for devnet0 (interop without pqsig)

I'll try port the entire devnet0 markdown specs to python next week so we can decide md vs python before going into devnet1.
